document_data.name: Protection From Fire, 15' Radius
document_data.mainbody: '''''Protection from fire, 15' radius''''' was a [[spell]] used by the [[Red Wizards of Thay]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell protected the caster from all forms of fire, both mundane and magical. The spell could even protect against elemental fire. It created a small area of protection around the caster, 15 feet (4.5 meters) in radius. This protected area moved with the caster.
document_data.Casting: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[material component]], a vial of water.
